svc@... wrote:
> Dear all.
> Would it be possible to allow overriding of QuotaEnforcer settings?
> I'm specifically interested in overriding the group-max-success-kb setting

It looks like it should just work.  We go to the settings system with a 
CrawlURI context every time we do the check (See 
http://crawler.archive.org/xref/org/archive/crawler/prefetch/QuotaEnforcer.html#141).   
Do you want to try it on your end and if works, send us a patch (Looks 
like all you have to do is change QuotaEnforcer constructor so added 
elements get the 'overrideable' property set).  Otherwise file an RFE 
S�ren and we'll have a go at it on this end.

Thanks,
St.Ack
>
